channel.title: Help with My new server
channel.description:
Hello mopar, i'm new in this, but me and my friend have a pc host for a server that we want to make. we need to know how to have a server with a router to connect to internet. because it give me problems with ip, it give me a private ip and people can log into the server.
this is the problem. any help or comentary accepted.
add me if you are interested in help, who help fixing this, will be moderator, and the server will be 24/7 online.
